name: Save2Help
tag_list: service-marketplace, local-services, group-buying, collective-buying, social-networking, web-2-0, charity, philanthropy, local-community, social-commerce
overview:
Save2Help aims to be a social enterprise mixture of both the Amazon of service business and the Salvation Army of philanthropy.

SUMMARY: Weâ€™d like to be the largest online marketplace for local services worldwide, offering the best services with transparent rating for personal, home and business alike at discount up to 40% off standard rates. With our exclusive viral and cause marketing technology combined with group buying power, Save2Help will deliver the most efficient ways to serve service providers as well as service buyers. Most importantly, the huge savings of each project will be an option to donate to your preferred charities without spending any extra money from your pocket that definitely will benefit your community. It is the most valuable asset of human as virtual philanthropists.

Existing Problems of Service Industry

Service Consumer a. No trusted and objective sources b. No tracking history records c. Yellow page information only d. No comparison e. Service quality unknown

Service Provider a. Demand fluctuates b. Passively recruit new customers c. One customer per deal d. Offline advertisement e. Each customer required differently

Solutions of Save2Help Service Model

a. Seamless Integrated Platform of Both Consumers and Providers Like b. Fair and Open Rating with Transparent Tracking Records (Viral Marketing) c. Consumers Receive Higher Quality Service at much Lower Price d. Providers Get Multiple Customers Per Deal Via Group Buying e. Focus on Local Market to Enhance Community Betterment

Opportunity

Save2Help is recognizing this unique role that high quality services combined with the power of group buying will create an unexplored market which will captures new demand with lower price. There is ample opportunity for growth that is both profitable and rapid. Most important, Save2Help is pioneering a new model of giving that will totally change traditional way of collecting donation*. According to marketing strategist Gina Carr, â€œThis is THE differentiating strategy for 21st century businesses.â€

According to 2009 Service Annual Survey of U.S. Census Bureau, Service-related providers excluding wholesale and Retail trades have over 7 millions companies and 114 millions households occupied 70.0% of the total GDP income with $6,800* billions of expenditures. E-Commerce as percentage of total service in 2009 only has 2.1% compared to 3.9% of e-retail of all U.S. retail. Itâ€™s amazing there is no such a generic B2C service e-commerce platform existing on the market while Amazon plays a major role in B2C e-retailer over 15 years.

Business Model

â€œCanâ€™t see the forest for the treesâ€ is the best explanation of our competitors. For example, www.care.com is in care giving sector and www.servicemagic.com most works on home improvement. In Contrast, SAVE2HELP sees both the forest and the trees and covers most of categories in service industry. We really gains visibility into the real drivers of value which fully utilizes group buying, viral marketing and cause marketing together to set apart from any other competitions. Our business model is thoughtfully analyzed, evaluated and generated based on critical metrics model of Blue Ocean Strategy. Save2Help makes the extra effort to get a breakthrough that could finally create a framework to fit most of various services. In addition, processes have been finished by means of powerful group buying tools and online social networking functions. Eventually it accomplishes 4 WINS strategy as an overarching community-centric concept of take-give socially charitable duty. That is, service providers, service buyers, charity organizations and SAVE2HELP itself.
